subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Same stupid nasty negative BS!
author: Kim Sharples
full_text:
all the experts know ghosts can't cuss.......?????
are you kidding me?

While I've never been fortunate to use a box - this is just bull*&^%....
I've heard EVP's with cussing...

try not to let it get you down...

Kim S



On Tue, Jun 8, 2010 at 2:59 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>wrote:

>
>
>  Got letter(e-mail) from a world renowned EVP authority( name withheld cuz
> I know the threats that would come), explaining how they tested the boxes
> and found nothing to it, y'all just silly uninformed masses that don't know
> any better and they'll tell us all what's ok to hear and believe in!
> Thousands of box users and experiencers are either lying or insane!
>
>  Pseudo scientific BS! Their testing reveals exactly what they expectt,
> that is the nature of the paranormal. Getting the results they wanted, they
> puff out their chests and proclaim yet another victory for science!
> Science has a habit of supplying exactly the results wanted by whoever is
> paying for the tests..
>
>  First, where do they find people that are somehow qualified listeners!?
> WTF is that S---!? It's BS, and they know it. Same old skeptic/science crap,
> except from a group that wants to be the worlds onlyest EVP authority.
>
>  I'm sure there will be articles in major paranormal mags proclaiming how
> the experts thoroughly debunked the boxes.
>
>  They keep testing and getting nothing, and the rest of us keep recording
> and have no shortage of voices that others can hear, can be validated, and
> gives infromation that's unknow to the listener. I just posted a video where
> a voice says "I said fuck" just to show it's not broadcast frags. This stuff
> conveniently ignored.  I've been kicked off groups for getting voices thast
> somehow were judged not ghostly enough, cuz all the experts know ghosts
> can't cuss, they can barely even talk and communcate!
>
>  They send me their stupid results thinking I'm the one out there pushing
> boxes. Ignorant dorks, it's the results pushing boxes!
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
>  
>

all he expe s know ghos s can' cuss.......?????a e you kidding me?While I' e ne e been o una e o use a box - his is jus bull*&^%....I' e hea d EVP's wi h cussing... y no o le i ge you down...
